author: vorot93
content:
I'm trying out retroactivation of EVM opcodes on Ethereum mainnet - so far I have managed to retroactivate from genesis and successfully sync with:
* DELEGATECALL
* RETURNDATASIZE
* RETURNDATACOPY
* STATICCALL

author: vorot93
content: I did hit consensus failure with REVERT retroactivated, so that switch has to stay.
